textContent: What's the most clear and alive in me? Is our friendship. And what that means to me is we have more clear and aligned boundaries and expectations as friends than we do as a married couple. The challenges have consistently arised when it comes to what I want and feel like I need in a marriage to manifest my whole self and feel complete, and what you feel like you need and want in a marriage. And it feels like those are different things. So then go to all kinds of lengths to shape-shift and match the expectations which is not sustainable because it creates resentment
textContentHtml: What's the most clear and alive in me? Is our friendship. And what that means to me is we have more clear and aligned boundaries and expectations as friends than we do as a married couple. The challenges have consistently arised when it comes to what I want and feel like I need in a marriage to manifest my whole self and feel complete, and what you feel like you need and want in a marriage. And it feels like those are different things. So then go to all kinds of lengths to shape-shift and match the expectations which is not sustainable because it creates resentment
